versiculos.texto: Ne Papuru ti'uximayatame nekanihikitini Kakaiyari hetsiemieme, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu ni'arieya nekanihikitini, yuri neti'erieti yaxeikia yuri kememite'erie miki Kakaiyari miwaranayexei, mipaita netimaiti tita yuri miraine, kemireuyewetse yamitimaikaki Kakaiyari xika 'ayexeiyani. [cite: 4298, 4299]
Mipai nekatiniyurieneni nemitakwewieki tukari mikaxiwe nemexeiyaniki, Kakaiyari pikati'itawa, meripaiti tukari kaxuawekaku 'akuxi mipai putayi tukari mitatsipitianikekaiki. [cite: 4301]

Hikirixia tukari 'aixia mi'ane 'aye'aku, matsiikime kanayeitiani yuniuki, teiteri yametekuxatakaku, nekaniuhiritiarieni mipai nemitikuxataniki ne, mipai mitiuta'aiki tatsiwikweitsitiwame Kakaiyari. [cite: 4302]

Ne nekamaniwairitiaka Titu, yuriki pekani- neniwetini, yuri ketemite'erie tanaiti: Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari, meta Ti'aitame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu mitatsiwikweitsitiwame, 'aixia mekete'u'iyarini 'ahetsiemieme, 'a'iyaritsie mekematsipitiaka pemika'uximatiariekaki. [cite: 4303, 4304, 4305]
Mikiki nekameneku'eirieni Kiretatsie, mireuyewekai pemireniniki, pemiwakuyatsaxianiki 'ukirawetsixi xexuime kiekaritsie, yaxeikia kenemimatiutahiawixi, [cite: 4311, 4312, 4313]

kemi'ane mikaniukimarie, kemi'ane xeihikiame mi'iya, kemi'ane yitiriyama miwarexeiya yuri mete'eriekame wahetsie karahiiwakaku, kename merukuyatiwe kename mekahei'enie mipai karaniuwakaku. [cite: 4314]

Kakaiyari hetsiemieme mihiritiarieki, kaneuyeweka kemi'ane ti'iwiyame mihiki mikaniukimariekaki, yuhetsiemieme xeikia pikayianeni, mayu'eriya pikahikitini, tawekame pikahikitini, pikawatiwayani, tumini pikahiwe'erieka kwamanarikaki. [cite: 4315, 4316]

Matsi peuyewetse yukie miwatanaki'erieniki 'iwatamete, pinaki'erieka tita 'aixia miti'ane, pitimaiweni, heitseriemeki yapitikamieni, Kakaiyari payexeiyani kwinimieme, pitseiyeni yu'iyaritsie kemitiyu'aitia. [cite: 4317]

Peuyewetse mitiwiyaniki niuki yuri mainetsie, 'ikitsika kemitiuta'ikitiarie hepai, miyiweniki miwatuikani ti'ikitati 'ikitsika 'aixia mi'aneki yemeki, meta piyiweni miwatahekiataki meminiukixie. [cite: 4318]
Yumiireti 'ameniu'uwani mekaheu'enanati, yaki xeikia metekuxatati, meteyukwamanati, miki xitekiya 'iniariyaritsie memitewiya matsi yemeki miya mepi'anene. [cite: 4319]
Peuyewetse memanunamiyarieniki kememitekuxata, mepiwamuina 'atsita xeime kie kiekatari yunaime, mepite'ikita tita 'aixia mikati'ane, mete'iwakuti xeikia 'axamiti'aneki. [cite: 4320]

Wahetsia mieme tixaxatame mipai kaniutayini: <<<Kiretatari yuheyemeki mekateni'itawani, yeutari memayu'eririya mekanihikitini, mekaniyu'iraraxieka yuyuriepa metewiyati xeikiaÂ». [cite: 4324, 4326, 4327]
Miki yemeki yuriki kaniutayini. 'Ayumieme keniwarutati'a tirikaiyemeki, miki memitsetseiyeniki, yuri mete'erieti 'aixia 'anemeki, [cite: 4328]
mekawa'enieti huriyutsixi yaki xeikia kememite'ixatsita meta tita memite'aita teiteri memixani'erie tita yuriki miraine. [cite: 4329]

Kememite'ixeiya miki memi'itiyatika, naiti katini'itiyaka, peru miki memika'itiyatika yuri memikate'erie kememite'ixeiya, tixai pikatixuawe miti'itiya, matsi mekanitsewiximarieka kememiteyumate meta yu'iyaritsie. [cite: 4330]

Mekaniyuhekiatani kename waniu me'imate Kakaiyari me'utiyuati, peru kememiteyurie mepiyuhekiata matsi kename meka'imate, mekanixani'eriwani, yamepikatekahu, mepikayiwawe 'aixia memite'uyurieni. [cite: 4331]
'Eki matsi pita mipai ketinekuxatani kemireuyewetse, 'ikitsika 'aixia mi'aneki. [cite: 4335]

'Ukirawetsixi mekeyumateni, 'aixia meketehekahuni, meketehemaiwaweni kemireuyewetse yamitiyurieneniki, meketsetseiyeni yuri kememite'erie, kememiteyukanaki'erie, kememite'uka'eniwa. [cite: 4336, 4337, 4338, 4339]

Yaxeikia 'ukarawetsixi kememite'u'uwa, mipai meketeyurieka kemireuyewetse yamitiyurieneniki Kakaiyari hetsia miemetiti, mepikatehayuye'unieka, winuki mepika'u'uwani xeikia. Tita 'aixia miti'aneki xeikia mekete'ikitani, [cite: 4343]
mipai metewa'ikitiati 'ukari memiwanaki'eriekaki yikinama meta yitiriyama, [cite: 4346, 4347]

yukie memitemaiwaweniki kemireuyewetse yamitiyurieni meta yikinama wahetsie memitewiyaniki me'itiyatikaiti, memite'uximayakaki, 'aixia memite'u'iyariniki, memiteyu'aitiariniakaki wakinama kememaitika, xika mipai me'aneneni, Kakaiyari niukieya 'axapikatikuxaxatsiwani. [cite: 4350]
Mipai yaxeikia ketiniwatuikani 'ukitsi memitemaiwaweniki kemireuyewetse yamitiyurieneniki. [cite: 4351, 4352, 4353]
Naime hepaitsita 'iniari kena'ayeitiwani 'aixia petiyurieneti. Kepemiti'ikita, 'a'iyaritsie 'aixia peti'akihiaweti ketine'ikitani 'aixia petikamieti. [cite: 4354]
Mipai ketinekuxatani 'aniuki 'aixia 'anemeki meta xewiti mikayiweniki mitawe'eriekaki, kemi'ane mixe'aye'unie mitewiyatsitiarieniki matsi, kayiweti mayaniki 'axamaineniki xehepaitsita. [cite: 4355]
Miki wairiyarika memite'uximaya wakutsiyarima meketeyu'aitiariniaka kememaitika naimeki, mekewanaki'aritiaka matsi, mepikayu'ariwawieka. [cite: 4356, 4357, 4358, 4359, 4360]
Mepikatewanawatsirieka, mekewahekiatsitiiyani matsi yamemitekahuki, tatsiwikweitsitiwame Kakaiyari 'ikitsikaya witsimitixeiyariekaki naimeki. [cite: 4361, 4362, 4363, 4364, 4365, 4366]
'Ari matsiikiti kanayani 'aixia kemitiuka'iyari Kakaiyari, mipai mi'aneki, yunaiti teiteri mekaniyiwaweni memitawikweitsitiarieniki, [cite: 4370]

'ayumieme mipai tekateni'ikitiarieka temitahekiataniki kename miki Kakaiyari memika'ayexeiya wahetsia tekamiemete, kename tame teka'ihiwe'erie tita kwiepa memitama memitehiwe'erie. Matsi yeme 'ipai pita tepite'ikitiarie ketemite'u'uwaniki, tetemaiwaweti kemireuyewetse yatemiteyuriekaki, heitseriemeki yatetekahuti, Kakaiyari te'ayexeiyati hiki temu'uwaniki 'ena kwiepa, [cite: 4371, 4372]

meta temikwewiekaki kemi'ane yemeki mitatsitemawieritiani. Hiki tepikwewie, matsiikiti mayaniki witsi'aneti kemi'ane Kakaiyari mihiki mimariwe tatsiwikweitsitiwame Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hikititi. [cite: 4373]

Miki kaniyuyetuani tahetsiemieme, mitatsixinaki 'iniari temeutitsanaxiaku, meta mitatsi'itieniki yuhetsiemieme teiterimama temanayexeiyarie temakineki, tetawairiyati 'aixia temiteyuriekaki. [cite: 4374]
Mipai ketinekuxatani meta wairiyarika keniwapitiaka, keniwahekiatiaka heitserie petiwa'aitiati, xewiti mikamatsitawe'eriekaki. [cite: 4375]
Keniwaraye'eritiwani yamemitekahuniki te'aitamete heitserie memexeiya kememaitika, memiteyu'aitiariniakaki, memiyuwairiyaniki 'aixia memiteyuriekaki tsepa kemititita 'aixia miti'ane: [cite: 4379]
hipame wahepaitsita 'axamemika'utiyuaneniki, memikayukwitiweniki, memika'ayu'eririyaniki, mimatsiikiniki kename tixaiti mekatehiki kememitewaxeiya yunaime teiteri. [cite: 4384, 4386, 4387, 4388]

Tameri tanaiti meripaiti 'atsitekatemaiti tekaniu'uwakaitini meta yatepikatekahukai. Tepeuyexiriekai wairiyarika tepite'uximayakai tita temitehiwe'eriekaitsie mieme xeikia, miiremeki teminaki'akaki xeikia tepiyiakai. 'Atepu'uwakai 'axateteyuriekuti meta te'itetsati. Tepixani'eriwakai, tepita'uxiwe'eriekai tanaiti. [cite: 4389, 4390]
Peru kepauka matsiikiti matia 'aixia kemitiuka'iyari meta Kakaiyari naki'eriyaya tatsiwikweitsitiwame, [cite: 4391]

miki kataniutawikweitsitiani, tame heitseriemeki yatemitekahukaiki pikatiuyuri, matsi miki mitatsinenimayakaiki pita. Pitatsi'utawikweitsitia tatsi'itieti hutarieka tatsi'utinuiwitiaka, 'Iyari Mitiyupataki tatsihekwariyati. [cite: 4393, 4394]
Miki 'Iyari kaniutatuani tahetsie waikawameki temeixeiyaniki, tatsiwikweitsitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu yatatiumiku. [cite: 4395]
Heitserie tepupitiarie miki 'aixia mitiuka'iyariki, 'ayumieme tahetsie katininakeni tukari mikaxiwe temexeiyaniki, mipai yuri tete'erieti tepita'ikwewa. [cite: 4396]

Miki niuki yuriki paine, mipai nepitiku'eriwa, peuyewetse tirikaiyemeki mipai pemitiwatahiaweki, miki yuri memite'uta'eriwa Kakaiyaritsie memiyu'iyaritiakaki peuyewetse 'aixia memiteyurieka. 'Aixia kani'anemiki kaniwaparewiekamiki teiteri, mipai memiteyuriekaki. [cite: 4397, 4398, 4400, 4405, 4406]

Peru niuki kememitexiatia 'atsimekatemaiti, kememitekuwautiwe yunuiwari hepaitsita, kememiteyuheka, 'iniari niukiyari hepaitsita kememiteyukwitiwe, miki hepaitsita kene'akweriwayurieka, 'axa'aneti payeika kememiteyurie meta xianakia payeika. [cite: 4407, 4408, 4409, 4410, 4411, 4412, 4413, 4414, 4415]
Kemi'ane yuhetsie mitiwawiyatsitia 'iwamarixi, miki hutakia pe'ita'imaiyame, kenanuyehiwa. [cite: 4416, 4417]
Mipai petimaiti, kemi'ane mipai mitiyuriene kaneutunini, 'axakatiniyurieneni, yikimana yuhetsie katiniuhipani. [cite: 4418, 4419]
'Ahetsia kepauka menuani 'Aritema yatini Tikiku nehenuni'ayu, kene'amexiitia nehetsia pemimieki Nikupuri paiti, mipai nepitiku'eriwa, mana nepekani muhaitinitsie. [cite: 4422]
Tsenaxi 'iniariki miti'ikitame meta 'Apuruxi keniwareparewieka naimeki, 'aixia 'iyariki pe'atatuati, huyeta tixaiti memikateheuyehiakaki. [cite: 4423]
Tateiterima mipai meketeyi'ikitiaka 'aixia memiteyuriekaki memeixeiyaniki tita mireuyewetse, kapa meka'utixuxuawereti me'akineki. [cite: 4424]
Yunaiti nehetsia memu'uwa kaniwairitiaka. 'Ekita keniwawairitiaka miki memitatsinaki'erie yuri mete'erieti. [cite: 4425, 4426]
'Aixia ketiuka'iyarini yunaime xehetsiemieme takakaiyari. Mipai xeikia. [cite: 4427]
